alert.note: Alert for Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued May 05 at 10:11PM CDT until May 06 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter to one half mile in dense fog. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Carlton and South St. Louis County. In Wisconsin, Douglas County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Fond du Lac Band. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dense fog has developed around the head of Lake Superior this evening and is expected to spread into the higher elevations overnight.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
